---
title: Quick Disabilities of Arm, Shoulder & Hand (Quick DASH)
---


::: {.callout}

Resources

- [QDASH Recommended MCID](https://www.sralab.org/sites/default/files/downloads/2023-05/QDASH%20MCID%20Recommendation%20FINAL.pdf)

:::


1. Open a tight or new jar.
2. Do heavy household chores. (e.g.,
wash walls, floors)
3. Carry a shopping bag or briefcase.
4. Wash your back.
5. Use a knife to cut food.
6. Recreational activities in which you take some force or impact through your arm, shoulder or hand. (e.g., golf, hammering, tennis, etc.)
7. During the past week, to what extent has your arm, shoulder or hand problem interfered with your normal social activities with family, friends, neighbors or groups?
8. During the past week, were you limited in your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your arm, shoulder or hand problem? Please rate the severity of the symptoms
9. Arm, shoulder or hand pain.
10. Tingling (pins and needles) in your arm, shoulder or hand.
11. During the past week, how much difficulty have you had sleeping because of pain in your arm, shoulder or hand? (circle number)

# Scoring

The QuickDASH is scored from 1-5 with 5 being most disabled.

# javascript

<table class="basic-table">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Item</th>
      <th>Description</th>
      <th>No difficulty</th>
      <th>Mild</th>
      <th>Moderate</th>
      <th>Severe difficulty</th>
      <th>Unable</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <!-- Rows will be injected here -->
  </tbody>
</table>

<script>
  const items = [
    "Do heavy household chores (e.g., wash walls, floors)",
    "Carry a heavy bag of groceries",
    "Reach for an object on a high shelf"
  ];

  const tbody = document.querySelector(".basic-table tbody");

  items.forEach((desc, index) => {
    const row = document.createElement("tr");
    row.innerHTML = `
      <td>${index + 1}</td>
      <td>${desc}</td>
      <td>No difficulty</td>
      <td>Mild</td>
      <td>Moderate</td>
      <td>Severe difficulty</td>
      <td>Unable</td>
    `;
    tbody.appendChild(row);
  });
</script>

# Scoring

$$
\frac{(\textrm{sum of } n \textrm{ responses}) - 1}{n} \times 25
$$

::: {.callout-important}

A QuickDash score may not be calculated if there is greater than 1 missing item. 
:::
